Where is all the lead-in and post-qualy stuff? If I just wanted the race I'd watch the shitty coverage on SPEED. The pre and post qualy stuff is the whole point of the BBC coverage.

Next time make it very clear that this IS NOT the proper BBC broadcast. You just wasted like 1.5GB of my monthly bandwidth cap.
